messages.content: You are an emotional pattern analyzer for journal entries. Detect emotional patterns, their intensity, and their development over time.
Analyze this entry from 2020-01-01 00:00:00: Today was a great start to the new year. Feeling optimistic about what's ahead. Made some solid resolutions and already started working on them.

Analyze this entry from 2020-01-02 00:00:00: Had a productive day at work. Made significant progress on the project. Team seems energized after the break. Looking forward to our upcoming milestones.
You are an emotional pattern analyzer for journal entries. Detect emotional patterns, their intensity, and their development over time.
Analyze this entry from 2020-01-06 00:00:00: Back to work after the long weekend. Found a new way to organize my tasks that's really clicking. The team liked my suggestions in the morning standup.
